topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
Hey guys I'm looking into military stuff for a fanfic, with Shining Armour, kind of a funny thing its turning out to be. Though a bit dark at the same time, think MLP and Generation Kill, though not as heavily mixed.

I'm trying to figure out how Shining Armour would function in the marine corps when they get shipped overseas thanks to America invading Equestria and then subjugating the local populace and turning Equestria into an expansion of America. At the moment its turning out rather interesting.

Oh just to note Celestia and Luna were forced to abdicate their thrones when the US military came knocking on their doors with nukes. 
So yeah, Equestria is now an expansion of America, and they're at war with smaller nations across the ocean, and well busy trying to wipe out some bugs, the Changling kind of bugs.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
actually easy way to deal with black knights
circle strafe
just circle him till he attacks
he should miss you
and leave himself open for a backstab
btw
you can't backstab while shielding
